text: The 2021 season is the Los Angeles Rams' 84th season in the National Football League and the fifth under head coach Sean McVay. ==Draft== 2021 Los Angeles Rams Draft Round Selection Player Position College 2 57 Tutu Atwell WR Louisville 3 103 Ernest Jones LB South Carolina 4 117 Bobby Brown III DT Texas A&M; 130 Robert Rochell CB Central Arkansas 141 Jacob Harris WR UCF 5 174 Earnest Brown IV DE Northwestern 7 233 Jake Funk RB Maryland 249 Ben Skowronek WR Notre Dame 252 Chris Garrett LB Concordia–St. Paul ==Regular season== ===Schedule=== The Rams' 2021 schedule was announced on May 12.
